text: aldhyn yakhrujun 'amwalahum fi aljhad wanwae alkhyr, thuma la yutbieun ma 'anfaquu min alkhayrat mannaan ealaa man aetawh wala 'adhana biqawl 'aw fiel ysherh baltfdl elyh, lahum thwabhm aleazim eind rbhm, wala khawf ealayhim fima ystqblwnh min 'amr alakhrt, wala hum yahzanun ealaa shay' fatihim fi hadhih aldnya
